20060314

- use 'Introduce Indirection' on the following 'run' with a JRE 1.5.

public class ThreadRunner {

	private static class MyThread extends Thread {
		public void run() {
		}
	}
	
	public void startInBackground() {
		MyThread thread= new MyThread();
		thread.run();
	}
}
